text:
Among my family, I'm the smallest in size,
and among my peers, I'm the weakest, and the least experienced.

Because I'm still young, still an apprentice,
people around me laugh and forgive me.
But I don't know what will happen after that.

That's why I knew all along that I had to train
twice as hard, or else everyone
would leave me behind.

Ever since my sibling's height wasn't much
different from mine, I've continued to learn
training and hunting knowledge-

When his body rapidly grew
and he surpassed me by a head,
I doubled my self-training menu.

Even though I knew there's a difference in species,
I don't want to use that as an excuse to stop.

Even if I can't catch up to the adults,
I want to at least stand beside my sibling,
so I continue to train diligently.

It was something I decided myself,
without having to swear to anyone.

Every day, I leave my room
before Sterio wakes up and start training.

I keep going on my road work,
disguised as me patrolling the settlement,
until I hear the signal from home.

When I return home, Sterio,
who has woken up, greets me and
begs to go for a walk with me.

What is serious training for me,
just means a casual walk to my sibling-

No, no, if I have time to think about such things,
I have to tell myself to keep looking forward,
and suppress my jealousy and impatience.

The "walk" after breakfast is at Sterio's pace,
who is much faster than me.
I don't have time to think about unnecessary things.

The difference in our abilities,
I have no idea when that gap will shrink.
Perhaps everyone has already gone to a place I can't reach.

Sterio, who has abilities comparable to his seniors,
becomes my hunting dog,
but if the hunter (me) is like this-

Turning away from such frustration,
helplessness, and anxiety about the future,
I could only continue to look forward.

At that time, I was captivated
by a live stream of a hero show
I watched casually.

A slender hero in a dress
played with and beautifully
defeated tough villains.

A very small beastman alien
hero was confronting a monster
many times its size.

A child hero who looked
younger than me dancing gracefully,
helping his companions.

I was mesmerized by the sight of heroes of various appearances,
each utilizing their strengths to great effect.

I thought that in this place,
even I could be useful to everyone
in some way.

If I could become a hero,
I wouldn't have to worry about being a burden
to my family or sibling-

I thought that the excellent Sterio would inherit the family business,
and I would find a different path,
and we would both have a good future.

That's why I told my father and mother
that I wanted to be a hero. And yet-

I never imagined that
Sterio would also say he wanted to be a hero.

I don't know why.
But he always acts as if walking the
same path as me is his second nature.

I can't say "No, don't follow me".
Because his future is his own.

I know that I'm just feeling complicated emotions
and Sterio isn't doing anything wrong.

While heading to Earth on the spaceship,
I was looking forward to meeting heroes-

"May only I be able to become a hero".
...I was wishing for something so cowardly.

Chapter 4:
He's His Person, And I'm My Person

name: Canes
text:
Sterio, you...
…………….

name: Mokdai
text:
Wow, you really transformed!
That's great, Sterio-kun.

name: Narihito
text:
First of all, congratulations, Sterio-kun!
Before you start hero activities,
there are many administrative things waiting for you-

name: Narihito
text:
But all of that can be explained in words,
and it's something we can help with.
So let's not think about it now.

Mokdai and Narihito welcome
the birth of a new hero.
-Yes, this is a joyous occasion.

Although he understands that intellectually,
Canes cannot honestly celebrate his sibling's wish coming true,
and he chokes on his words.

name: Canes
text:
-It's amazing, ahaha.
You did it, Sterio!
How did you transform?

Even if he managed to speak,
he couldn't force a smile.
He didn't even know how he felt right now.

name: Sterio
text:
I don't know!
I wished I wanted to be a hero,
but I didn't do anything else...?

name: Canes
text:
W-what do you mean you don't know!?
You just transformed, and you don't
even know how-

Canes recalls the words of the heroes
he had questioned so far.
None of them had a clear answer.

Even the heroes themselves cannot
clearly explain how to awaken.

Canes swallows the emotions that were about to burst forth and organizes
the information. The frown between his brows disappears,
and the tension in his whole body relaxes.

name: Canes
text:
-I see, there was
no answer from the beginning.

name: Canes
text:
Whether you can awaken or not
is determined by whether that person
is suited to be a hero, isn't it?

name: Canes
text:
Hey... [Player]-san.
Isn't that right?

It would be easier to give up cleanly
if someone else would admit
that he simply wasn't suited for it.

Because then he could tell himself
that he wasn't left behind by his sibling,
but just took a different path.

options.text: Is there such a thing as aptitude?

text:
[Player], who has witnessed
many companions awaken as heroes,
answered.

options.text: It might be too early to draw conclusions.
I don't think you need to give up.
No one can know about aptitude.

name: Canes
text:
…………….
Why do you
think that way, [Player]-san?

dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player] talks about their childhood friend who always cared for them, who had lost their memories.

There were times when he awakened as a hero, then let go of his dream and couldn't transform.
Yet, he still came back-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Mokdai
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My story!?
It's fine, but hearing it from [Player]'s mouth makes me feel a bit awkward, ahaha...
[Player] talks about their senior colleague who has always watched over them since they changed jobs to the hero industry.
It's because he bravely reached for his wish that they are alive here and now-
[Player] talks about their colleague who frankly reprimands her companions and sometimes gently supports them.
Facing her past, overcoming the separation from her family, and gaining new bonds and a firm dream-

options.text: So, I don't think you need to give up.

name: Canes
text:
...Thank you,
[Player]-san.

name: Canes
text:
I'm not confident that I can become
a splendid adult like everyone at Parallel Flight.
But-

name: Canes
text:
I'm happy that you say such things
to me, who you just met.

name: Sterio
text:
Sorry Canes, I'm not smart,
so I can't teach you anything
about how to transform...

name: Canes
text:
I'm sorry too, Sterio.
Even though you finally managed to transform,
I poured cold water on your happiness.

name: Canes
text:
That's right, more than me,
it's better for your wish to come true first.
I thought so myself, though.

name: Sterio
text:
...Woof?
What, what do you mean?

name: Canes
text:
It's nothing, just me talking to myself.
-Sorry for getting flustered,
[Player]-san, everyone.

Canes pretends to be calm,
and apologizes with a forced smile
that is utterly unbefitting his age.

Rokusei, who had been watching
the boys' situation from a distance,
spoke to [Player] quietly.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
(Oh dear, how endearing...
But if I say that, Canes-kun will surely
get upset.)

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
(But, the impatience of being unable to become anything,
I understand it painfully well...
So much so that I can't see it as someone else's problem.)

Talent, aptitude, or perhaps species and birth.
Rokusei has lived through the unreasonable reality
where things he couldn't choose became barriers.

In contrast, Canes, because he could
freely decide his own path,
couldn't fully become anything.

He didn't have the ability to inherit the family business,
and he didn't know if he could awaken like Sterio
and walk the path of a hero.

Being able to do both, as his mother said, was out of the question;
he was a half-hearted person, neither one nor the other-
That's how Canes currently evaluates himself.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
(I don't intend to meddle in their sibling relationship,
but if possible, I want to look after them
until they understand the "form of their dream".)

Rokusei returns a smile
instead of words to [Player] and
calls out to the boys.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Alright, in that case, this old man
will stick with you guys all the way!
Let's meet more heroes.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Besides the food area, hero agencies
are also setting up shops, so
let's visit them all!

name: Narihito
text:
However... for now, it seems
we'll just have to wait until the evacuation
order is lifted and the venue is confirmed safe.

name: Narihito
text:
Also... I'm really sorry about this, but
I need to get back to work soon.
I have to report the details of the previous incident to my superior.

name: Mokdai
text:
Oh, I forgot!
I'm on duty at the food stall right now.
I have to get back before they reopen-

name: Mokdai
text:
Also, we haven't eaten yet
after that commotion, have we...?
Aren't you all hungry? Let's go back together!

name: Sterio
text:
Justice Curry!?
Want, want, I'm hungry~!

name: Canes
text:
Whoa, gross!
Sterio, don't drool on my head!
Um, you'll have to excuse us, Rokusei-san-

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
I know. I'm hungry too, so
let's go meet other heroes
after we've eaten lunch.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
[Player],
is that okay with you too?

options.text: The deliciousness of lunch on expenses!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahaha, Gammei-kun would be envious if he heard that.
Should I take a picture and send it to him?

options.text: I'm curious about the food stall next door too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'll treat you to that.
Canes-kun and Sterio-kun are growing boys, so they'll eat anything, right?

text:
The relieved group
converses peacefully and
returns to the food area.

Soon after, the venue's alert status
was lifted, and Hero Festa resumed.

With their stomachs full, [Player] and the others
walk through the Hero Festa venue again
and arrive in front of a certain building.

At the entrance, a large signboard
with "Summer Vacation Hero Consultation Room"
written in brushstrokes was propped up.

options.text: The hero agency in charge was, I think...
So there was a section like this.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
This consultation room is operated by
a hero agency called
"Heroic Educators".

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Teachers, scholars, and
heroes involved in education
are affiliated with them.

Rokusei explains about the booth they visited
in a way that the boys from outside the Earth Sphere
could understand.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
In some regions of Earth, during the hot season,
it's called "summer vacation," and companies
and schools close for a while.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
It seems that heroes who are usually teachers
or scholars have set up
this consultation room during that period.

name: Canes
text:
I've heard of summer vacation!
It's a long break, but you get a ton of homework
and end up crying at the end.

name: Canes
text:
Our father is from Earth, and
sometimes he tells us stories from the past.
School, huh, I want to go...

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Are there no schools on Muirauka I?
Even so, you two seem to be able to
read and write properly.

name: Sterio
text:
We study at home.
We always use communication, and sometimes we visit teachers.
But we've never been to school yet!

While waiting in line,
they talk about their respective planets
and local life.

Canes has completely regained his composure,
and converses casually with
[Player] and Rokusei. However-

He no longer had the sparkling eyes
he had when they first met

dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player] casually looks at Rokusei's face.
He doesn't show any particular concern for Canes.

[Player] casually looks at Rokusei's face.
He doesn't show any particular concern for Canes.

text:
While continuing their casual conversation
about hobbies and favorite games,
it was finally their turn.

Guided by an apprentice hero,
they are led into a room,
and the group meets two heroes.

name: Kyoichi
text:
Alright, next person,
thank you for waiting... what,
it's you, [Player]!

name: Kyoichi
text:
Could it be that you came to see me on purpose?
What, you're doing something cute, hey-

As if to greet, Kyoichi closes the distance
to [Player] and subtly attempts
physical contact.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kyoichi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh-
Whoa, my apologies, welcome to the Hero Consultation Room!
What, are you escorting a guest?

options.text: Those things can wait for later...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hello~ you two lovebirds!
This is the Hero Consultation Room, right!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kyoichi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ow ow ow ow ow!
Akashi taught you this hold, didn't he!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-kun!?
That sure looks like a lot of fun, but the customers will be surprised, so take it easy...?

text:
While [Player] and the others evade
Kyoichi's usual greetings (pranks),
the other hero-

name: Marfik
text:
Hoh-hoh, well, well,
this is quite...

name: Sterio
text:
What, what, are you someone who likes fur?
If you brush me, you can
fluff me up a lot!

name: Marfik
text:
Indeed, your fur is certainly beautiful, but
what I'm interested in is the splendid
skeleton that forms that physique!

name: Marfik
text:
Oh, that young man over there also has a magnificent body,
his evenly trained muscles are wonderful, but
each of the bones supporting them is also beautiful!

name: Canes
text:
Eh, can you tell bones in detail
just by feeling them from the outside?
Um, Hero... Professor?

name: Marfik
text:
Oh, my apologies, I'm Marfik.
I'm a hero affiliated with Heroic Educators,
and I'm an archaeologist.

name: Marfik
text:
Among other things, I have a keen eye for fossil excavation,
and I love to look at the bones of
all kinds of animals, hahahaha.

name: Kyoichi
text:
I'm Element Teacher.
I'm affiliated with Professor Marfik,
and I'm usually an elementary school teacher. Nice to meet you!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
I thought they were all involved in education
because they're here... but somehow
the teachers' personalities are too strong, aren't they?

name: Kyoichi
text:
This much is just right to get
students to remember our faces.
I'm still quite plain, you know?

name: Kyoichi
text:
Anyway... first off, could you tell us your
names and what kind of consultation
you'd like to have?

Kyoichi switches to his hero or teacher persona
and gently speaks to Canes and Sterio.

name: Sterio
text:
...Canes, are you okay?
Should I talk?

name: Canes
text:
Thanks, Sterio.
But it's okay... I'll explain.
You're not good at that, are you?

After introductions,
Canes explains the circumstances so far,
focusing on the events at Hero Festa.

name: Marfik
text:
I see.
How to awaken as a hero, huh...

Seeing Marfik and Kyoichi frown
and furrow their brows,
Canes speaks hesitantly.

name: Canes
text:
After all, there's nothing else
to talk about besides aptitude, is there?
Sorry for asking a strange question-

name: Kyoichi & Marfik
text: Excellent observation!

The heroes involved in teaching praised Canes
like they were praising their own student.

name: Canes
text:
-!?
Excellent... what is excellent about it?

name: Marfik
text:
Controlling the hero suit,
and simulating the abilities and characteristics
of Parallel Weapons-

name: Marfik
text:
At least on Earth, I hear that various engineers
are researching the relationship between hero abilities
and parallel universes, and how to utilize them.

name: Marfik
text:
However, the initial transformation... that is,
the "mechanism of hero awakening"
has not yet been fully elucidated.

Saying that, Marfik smiles,
as if his chest swells
at the unknown he speaks of.

name: Marfik
text:
Heroes are truly diverse.
Their origins and formations seem completely different.
However, that's just because we "don't know yet".

name: Marfik
text:
In other words, if you pursue your question,
I believe it could become a cutting-edge
research topic in modern times.

name: Canes
text:
B-but isn't my question something that can't be so
simply answered just by thinking about it?
Even heroes themselves can't answer it...

name: Marfik
text:
Who knows? Even if it's true now,
things might connect by chance, and
there might be a big discovery.

name: Kyoichi
text:
Speaking of heroes themselves not being able to answer,
I can't even correctly explain
how the suit I usually use works.

name: Kyoichi
text:
Besides, there are plenty of people who use
appliances and communication devices
without knowing how they work inside.

name: Kyoichi
text:
Even for hero awakening, even if the person themselves
doesn't understand it, smart people around them
will investigate and analyze it. But-

name: Kyoichi
text:
Canes-kun, if your current question hadn't existed,
smart people might not have been
even slightly interested in it.

name: Marfik
text:
Indeed, in the field of research,
noticing things and questioning them
are that important.

name: Marfik
text:
Congratulations, Canes-kun, Sterio-kun!
At your young age, you have opened the door
to the exploration of the unknown!

name: Marfik
text:
Do you two have any interest in archaeology?
With your splendid physiques and flexible minds,
in the future, in our laboratory-

options.text: But they've both decided on their futures.
Professor Marfik, you're getting ahead of yourself!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Marfik
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that so?
If I invite them now, in a few years, they might be wielding pickaxes with me at an excavation site, you know?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
He's aggressive, this professor!
But let me tell you, both of them have already decided on their future paths, you know?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Marfik
dialogue_after_selection.text: Indeed, that's a very corporate way of thinking, but it's true that in any industry, everyone wants to secure excellent talent first.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Marfik
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Moreover, educators like us can't help but polish raw talent when we see it.
Hahahaha!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
However, it seems they've already
decided on their future paths.

name: Marfik
text:
Oh, indeed, you said something like that earlier.
It's truly admirable for young people.

name: Marfik
text:
It's regrettable for me, but... you two,
do what you want to do, and choose any path
without leaving any regrets.

Yesterday and today, the heroes have
been concerned about him, showing him various possibilities,
and placing their hopes in him.

He wants to believe that, as they say,
a brilliant future awaits him at the end of his efforts.

However, he doubts that any convenient events
will come to him, who has achieved nothing yet-
Such doubts threaten to crush his hope.

name: Sterio
text:
Understood,
thank you, Sensei... hero?
I'm grateful either way!

Next to him, Sterio smiles and replies,
while Canes, with a troubled expression,
listens to his voice and calms his anxiety.

Heroes surrounding the consultant.
At that time, no one had yet noticed
the suspicious shadow observing them-

name: Space Pirate
text:
We found him, senior!
This is our target,
the one called [Player], right?

In a secluded corner of the venue,
figures with appearances far from heroic
are secretly conversing.

One opens a device he possesses
and shows a freshly stolen image,
and the other nods with satisfaction.

name: Space Pirate
text:
You did well, rookie!
I knew a strong Observer like [Player]
would definitely participate-

name: Space Pirate
text:
It was worth sneaking into Hero Festa.
Let's get plenty of praise from the boss later.

name: Space Pirate
text:
Hehehe... it's all thanks to you, senior!
But why is someone so bland
the boss's favorite?

name: Space Pirate
text:
I-I can definitely make the boss
happier than this person!

name: Space Pirate
text:
Well, just meet them in person.
Then you'll come to like [Player] too.

name: Space Pirate
text:
Really? Then let's quickly
snatch the target while the heroes
are still chatting!

Unaware that danger was quietly approaching,
[Player] was still focused on the conversation
with everyone in the Hero Consultation Room.

name: Kyoichi
text:
-So, the first question was
how to awaken as a hero, right?

name: Kyoichi
text:
If you can't think of a specific method,
how about looking back at what you were doing
at that time?

name: Kyoichi
text:
As for Sterio-kun, Canes-kun was
there with him, so he knows, right?
Then, what about the other heroes?

name: Marfik
text:
However, to recall the events of awakening,
at least for me,
too much time has passed.

name: Kyoichi
text:
Professor Marfik, there are many
rookie heroes participating
in this event, aren't there!

name: Kyoichi
text:
If they're rookies, they probably just awakened,
so they should remember the details
well, don't you think?

Hearing the word "rookie",
everyone present
turns to face Rokusei.

name: Canes
text:
...Huh. Rokusei-san was
next to [Player]-san just a moment ago,
wasn't he?

However, even looking around the consultation room now,
he cannot be seen anywhere.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text: Sorry for interrupting the conversation, I had an urgent matter to attend to.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text: No, isn't this also an important part of a hero's job?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Sorry for interrupting the conversation.
An urgent matter came up.
...So, [Player], you noticed?
As expected.

text:
Rokusei appears with a voice.
At his feet, standing at the room's entrance,
two figures lie fallen.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
While the teachers were having an important conversation,
I felt a gaze from outside the room.
I followed it and this is what happened.

name: Kyoichi
text:
Whoa, what's this, villains!?
How did you
get into Hero Festa?

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Apparently, they're fans of [Player].
So enthusiastic that they tried to
kidnap you somewhere.

options.text: That's not being a fan anymore, is it?

name: Space Pirate
text:
Damn it, we were on track
until we found the target...
I'm so frustrated, senior!

name: Space Pirate
text:
That cheerful hero completely pretended
not to notice us, I was totally fooled!

name: Canes
text:
No, first of all, it's 4 against 2, not enough manpower,
and if we're capturing them alive, it'll take even more effort,
we should call for backup first...

name: Sterio
text:
Papa always says that the one who is careless
will be hunted.
Do you want to study hunting at our place?

name: Space Pirate
text:
Straight logic! Anyway, what's with these guys,
"capturing alive" and "being hunted"?
Are they members of some mafia?

name: Kyoichi
text:
Hey, you two.
This isn't about hunting.
And what are you doing advising villains?

name: Canes
text:
Whoa, I'm sorry!
When I heard "target", I unconsciously
thought of our family business...

name: Sterio
text:
Not hunting?
But this person said "target."
What else are they going to do?

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
This old man is curious too~?
But let's leave that for the police
to handle...

Kyoichi, Marfik, and Rokusei
surrounded the villains.

name: Space Pirate
text:
Nooo! I don't want to go to
the lockup right after my debut!
Help me, Boss!

dialogue_after_selection.text: The moment [Player] realized who the person called "Boss" was, a voice echoed from outside the building.
The moment [Player] realized who the person called "Boss" was, a voice echoed from outside the building.

name: Suhail
text:
Gah-hah-hah-hah!
You did well, subordinates!
Leave the rest to me!

name: Suhail
text:
But listen up, rookies!
Don't call me "Boss"...
Call me "Captain"!!

Impact and rumbling assail the venue.
Rushing out of the building, they find it
already surrounded by numerous villains.

name: Suhail
text:
Long time no see!
Don't you look as lively as ever,
[Player]?

name: Suhail
text:
Hero Festa is an event for the whole city, right?
Then I, Space Pirate Suhail, will make it interesting!

name: Suhail
text:
First, it's the initiation ceremony
of our Bautista Pirate Crew! Subordinates!
Bring [Player] here!

name: Suhail
text:
I'll hijack the venue's broadcast and
loudly promote your pirate debut!
Gah-hah-hah-hah-hah!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
That villain is seriously trying to
recruit [Player] into his pirate crew!

name: Sterio
text:
[Player], let me transform!
They're surrounding us.
I have to protect Canes and everyone!

name: Canes
text:
Sterio...
......

options.text: It's an emergency, can't be helped.

text:
With [Player]'s approval,
Sterio is once again enveloped in light
and transforms into his hero form.

name: Suhail
text:
You two, are you the new faces?
At least among those I've fought so far,
there were no heroes like you.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Oh, you fight with heroes so often, huh?
You're quite the villain, aren't you?

name: Sterio
text:
I'm meeting you for the first time.
I'm Sterio. I just became a hero.
Nice to meet you!

name: Suhail
text:
...Pfft, hahahahaha!
A rookie who honestly introduces himself to a villain,
that's hilarious!

name: Suhail
text:
Alright! In that case, I'll
bring out my newly initiated subordinates too.
Let's have a rookie showdown!

name: Suhail
text:
If you win,
I'll withdraw from this place... How about it,
doesn't that sound like an interesting debut match?

name: Space Pirate
text:
C-captain!?
Are we going to fight
the heroes by ourselves!?

name: Suhail
text:
Don't whine!
You all know the motto of the
Bautista Pirate Crew, don't you!

name: Suhail
text:
Give it your all and knock down those heroes!
If you can... I'll give you
plenty of "rewards"!

name: Pirates
text:
We'll do it!!
Whoa, whoa, we absolutely
can't lose this battle...!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Hey, [Player]?
Is your daily life
always this chaotic?

options.text: I want to believe that's not true.

name: Kyoichi
text:
Professor Marfik, we need to
hurry and secure the safety
of the visitors remaining inside!

name: Marfik
text:
Hmm, it's regrettable to leave it to rookies, but
it's true that accepting the villain's proposal
will suppress further damage to the surroundings...

name: Marfik
text:
-Sorry, but I'm counting on you,
Sterio-kun, Rokusei-kun,
[Player]-kun...!
Battle Start

name: Space Pirates
text: Whoa-ho-ho-ho!?

Every time Sterio blows his giant horn,
gusts of wind and whirlwinds appear without warning,
pushing back the approaching villains.

They couldn't get
a single step closer
to [Player] or Canes.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
You're good, Sterio-kun.
Now I can concentrate on repelling them-
Hya!

The moment the sword Rokusei threw
touched a villain's arm, it transformed
into a mass of energy and exploded.

Just when it seemed like it would end in a one-sided battle,
the rookies of the Bautista Pirate Crew
also confronted the heroes with extraordinary vigor.

To gain the greatest reward,
they attacked with desperate expressions,
vying for credit.

name: Sterio
text:
You guys, enough already!
Behave yourselves!

As a particularly loud horn blast echoes,
it creates a small whirlwind
that engulfs the pirates.

name: Space Pirate
text:
Guh-nuh-nuh-nuh...
If I can win the battle and get a reward from the captain,
this kind of wind is nothing-

name: Space Pirates
text: Gwaaaah!!

The villains, defeated by the force of the wind,
collided with each other, and are sucked alongside the other members
of their crew, flying away-

Even those who held their ground were caught in the chain reaction,
and the members of the pirate crew
were all blown high into the sky at once.

name: Canes
text:
Sterio, can he move like that
even though he just transformed...?
And that weapon-

options.text: Everyone seems to be like that-

text:
[Player] explains about Parallel Weapons
to Canes, who is watching his sibling fight,
to the best of their knowledge.

After awakening, heroes
naturally understand how to use their Parallel Weapons
from the moment they acquire them-

Furthermore, in Sterio's case, he suggests that his usual
activities as a hunter might be influencing
his combat style.

name: Canes
text:
I understand. He's so strong and
agile that he's even comparable to
senior hunters.

name: Canes
text:
And yet he's not arrogant, and he always
thinks of his family, what a kind guy...
He's a sibling I am really proud of.

A voice that shakes the air and resonates deeply,
encouraging their companions in battle,
or rather like a beast's roar of intimidation.

Canes listened nostalgically to the sound
from Sterio's giant horn-shaped
Parallel Weapon and muttered.

name: Canes
text:
Even if he becomes a hero,
he'll surely be very active
and do well.

name: Canes
text:
Even if I could
transform into a hero,
it wouldn't be the same.

name: Canes
text:
......
He's truly amazing,
Sterio...

All the rookies of the Bautista Pirate Crew
were piled up in one place, stretched out.

The heroes won the battle.
Nevertheless, Suhail laughed heartily
from the bottom of his stomach.

name: Suhail
text:
Gah-hah-hah-hah!
This is hilarious, you rookies
are even more entertaining than I imagined!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
So, the battle's over,
but are you going to keep your promise,
Captain of the Pirate Crew?

name: Suhail
text:
Of course I'll retreat from this place.
But, I didn't promise to do
nothing and just sit quietly!!

At that moment, Suhail's Parallel Weapon
launched itself straight towards [Player].

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text: -[Player]!!

Handcuffs and bullets, two Parallel Weapons,
deflected the trajectory of the chained prosthetic arm,
protecting [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, are you two alright?
Now that this officer is here, you have nothing to worry about!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gammei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Geez, you're always in trouble, aren't you?
...Glad we made it in time.

name: Gammei
text:
From here on, UEHA shall takes over-
Bautista Pirate Crew, Suhail!
Today, you'll obediently let yourselves be arrested!

name: Barrel
text:
We officers will not allow
any more rampage
at this festival for citizens to enjoy!

name: Suhail
text:
Tch, it's you guys again!
You always interfere just when
things are getting interesting-

name: Suhail
text:
It can't be helped,
so that's enough for today!
Wake up the rookies, subordinates, retreat!

name: Gammei
text:
Like hell I'll let you escape
every single time, you idiot!
Just obediently get arrested-

name: Gammei
text: Daaaaah!?

A small spaceship, flying at Suhail's signal,
sprays water guns
at the heroes' faces.

name: Barrel
text:
Cough, cough!?
What is this, it's even more
troublesome than a smoke screen!

options.text: You're still doing as you please.

text:
While their companions created a diversion,
the members of the pirate crew scattered
and escaped into the sea and sky.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
How skillful...
That captain disappeared the moment
we looked away.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Sorry, Gammei-kun,
but let's just be glad we managed
to protect [Player].

Saying that his buddy's safety is the top priority,
Rokusei continues to guard the surroundings
with Sterio.

Eventually, UEHA also gave up the pursuit
and switched to investigating the infiltration route
and the venue with the Orient City police.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
But still, monsters and now villains,
it was a busy day, wasn't it?
You all should rest well today.

name: Canes
text:
...Yes.
Thank you again today,
[Player]-san, Rokusei-san.

name: Sterio
text:
Thank you~ I had fun today too!
I look forward to tomorrow,
goodbye!

Soon after disbanding, the sun set,
and the siblings, having eaten and bathed,
lie down in their respective beds.

They reflect on the day's events,
sharing what they enjoyed
and what interested them.

In doing so, Sterio didn't miss
Canes's occasional clouded expression.

name: Sterio
text:
...Canes, are you feeling unwell?
You've been listless ever since
we went to the consultation room.

name: Canes
text:
No, I'm fine now.
I heard a lot of things, and
I know what I should do.

name: Canes
text:
To the heroes we'll meet tomorrow,
let's ask about their agencies too.
...Good night.

name: Sterio
text:
……………
...Good night.

Canes turns his back to his partner
and pulls the blanket over his head.

He closed his eyes, and in the darkness, he reflects.
The reason why he started training so desperately, and
the true reason why he dreamed of being a hero.

name: Canes
text:
Tomorrow, if I ask everyone what I need to know,
it will surely be alright.
He'll be able to do it alone.

name: Canes
text:
And when this Hero Festa is over-
I'll just leave my dream on Earth.
